name: Hyperspace Panic! (Ludum Dare 50)
description:
Ludum Dare Jam 50 Theme: Delay The Inevitable

Hyperspace Panic is a 3D platformer set on a spaceship that is falling apart mid-flight. As the ship's mechanic, it's up to you to keep things working long enough for the rest of the crew to evacuate! 

This project was developed as a collaboration between Dnallohleoj and Knightlock, we both tried learning new things, and both ended up biting off way more than we could chew.  As such, there's a lot that doesn't quite work as intended. Or at all. This project is incomplete and likely will not be finished. Regardless, if you choose to check it out, I hope you enjoy it!
